QuestData.Title: Evacuate Snowmane
QuestData.Description: They just keep coming!$b$bAnd now my scouts report some of the drogbar have managed to sneak around our flank and are attacking Snowmane Village.$b$bGo, help the evacuation. We will hold the line here and try to buy you some time.
QuestData.LogDescription: Evacuate Red Skymane, Tarvim Daywalker, and Old Nefu.
QuestData.CompletionText: I knew we should have secured this town better.
QuestData.RewardText: And not a moment too soon. Our scouts report the Underking himself has come.
